trans-unit.source: Represents the displayable claim object.
Usually, the display tag (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property) and the description (the Description property) are localized.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property identifies different claim types.
The display value (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property) is the string representation of the claim.Resource.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type.
The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType"></xref> property.
claimType is `null` or an empty string.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, and description.
The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType"></xref> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag"></xref> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description"></xref> property.
claimType is `null` or an empty string.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, and description.
The claim is required.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A> property is initialized to `true` in the new instance.
The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType"></xref> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag"></xref> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description"></xref> property.
The display value for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue"></xref> property.
claimType is `null` or an empty string.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, description, and optional attribute.
The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType"></xref> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag"></xref> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description"></xref> property.
The display value for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue"></xref> property.
`true` if the claim is optional; otherwise, `false`.
Initializes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional"></xref> property.
claimType is `null` or an empty string.
Gets the claim type associated with the display claim.
This required attribute provides the unique identifier (URI) of the individual claim returned in the security token
A URI that represents the claim type.
Creates a display claim from the specified claim type.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> properties are set to default values based on the specified claim type.
If default values do not exist for the properties, they are set to `null`.
The URI that represents the claim type.
Returns <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>.
Gets or sets a description for the display claim.
This optional element provides a description of the semantics for the claim returned in the security token.
The description for the display claim.
Gets or sets the friendly name for the display claim.
This optional element provides a friendly name for the claim returned in the security token.
The friendly name for the display claim.
Gets or sets a displayable value for the display claim.
This optional element provides one or more displayable values for the claim returned in the security token.
The displayable value for the display claim.
Gets or sets the optional attribute for the display claim
The optional attribute.
`true` if the display claim is optional; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the optional attribute will be serialized.
`true` to serialize the optional attribute; otherwise, false.
The default value is `false`.
